title: Milan1009
author: Milan1009
content: GM crypto fam, wanted to share with you something that I believe it's relevant for all of us at some point: Crypto Events, a place where the guys behind the project show their faces and let us know directly the updates that they are working on towards a healthy progress. Recently I was looking at the Cross Chain Expo 2022, that took place on June 8th, it was exciting to see that some of the projects I have been following for years were there : Thorchain, Thorstarter, Brokkr and it was awesome to know that no matter the market cycle we are in, they are putting hard work to innovate and maintain their relevance over time.https://twitter.com/CrossChainExpoWhich projects are you currently following that are doing these kind of activities and why do you believe in them?
